name: grr_artifact_ts
description:
Collect artifacts from hosts using GRR.

- Collect a predefined list of artifacts from hosts using GRR
- Process them with a local install of plaso
- Export them to a Timesketch sketch
short_description: Fetches default artifacts from a list of GRR hosts, processes them with plaso, and sends the results to Timesketch.
args: Comma-separated list of hosts to process
Comma-separated list of artifacts to fetch (override default artifacts)
Comma-separated list of artifacts to append to the default artifact list
Sketch to which the timeline should be added
Optional custom password to decrypt Timesketch credential file with
Whether to verify the GRR TLS certificate
